rules_text: Reveal the top five cards of your library and separate them into two piles. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Shred any number of cards in the chosen pile. Put all cards not shredded this way into your graveyard. [i](To shred a card, exile it, then create a Saga enchantment token with “r{3}–You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost.”)[/i]
